text: avane hagalinolage ratriyannu ponisuvavanu hagu ratriyolage hagalannu ponisuvavanu mattu surya hagu candranannu vidheyagolisidavanu. Ellavu ondu nirdista avadhiya tanaka calisuttiruttade. A allahane nim'ma odeyanu. Visva samrajyavu avanige seride. Atta, avana horatu nivu prarthisuva bere yaru ondu kharjurada bijada tonnigu malakaralla
